comment: Like an SNL skit , this OAN investigation is batshit insane : + Within hours of reports of their visit , troops were patrolling Kyiv + That prompted them to charter a midnight jet to Vienna , and we sped to the airport + We came upon an entourage of Black Mercedes ... <URL>

      :snt2 (p2 / patrol-01

            :time (a / after

                  :quant (u / up-to

      :snt3 (p3 / prompt-01

                        :destination c

            :op2 (s2 / speed-01

      :snt4 (c3 / come-upon-26

            :ARG1 (e / entourage

                              :op2 "Mercedes")))))

comment: I like how the only video evidence they have amidst their claims of soldiers , black Mercedes and George Soros himself is a short clip of a car driving down a road and someone climbing into an airplane . That confirms everything !
amr:
